title: Fable's narrative lead has announced they are "stepping away" from the project
description: Anna Megill announced that they had joined the studio back in July 2022, but has now confirmed that they are moving on.

title: Starfield devs are forbidden from talking about "unreleased" details – but Bethesda boss Todd Howard isn't
description: Bethesda boss Todd Howard is the only person "authorized" to give away "unreleased game information".

title: Call of Duty will stay on PlayStation consoles thanks to this new "binding agreement" between Sony and Microsoft
description: Sony has secured a "binding agreement" with Microsoft to keep Call of Duty games on PlayStation consoles.

title: The iPhone 15 might mark a shift to a new battery technology for Apple
description: A switch to stacked battery technology could bring a variety of benefits for the next generation of Apple phones.

title: Linux is cool now - but why?
description: A new study shows that Linux growth is increasing, and there’s plenty of reason to put it on your enterprise devices.

title: Apple's latest patent suggests a rollable iPhone could be on the way
description: Apple has filed a patent for "electronic devices with rollable displays", and we're looking forward to what's next.

title: Only a handful of hackers are responsible for all email extortion attacks
description: Barracuda report claims many scam emails campaigns are the work of fewer than 100 attackers.
